titleStmt.title: A true relation of the actions of the Inniskilling-men from their first taking up of arms in December, 1688, for the defence of the Protestant religion, and their lives and liberties / written by Andrew Hamilton ...
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, Andrew, d. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"Books lately printed for Richard Chiswel" at end.
Half-title: The actions of the Inniskilling-men.
